snippet.title: PyxelKnight V1.0.3
snippet.description:
V1.0.3 is now out. http://www.pyxelknight.com

My family recently had a vacation so that is the main reason for the delay in this release. However now it's live and I can't wait for you to try it out.

Some of the new things I learned:

Improved Jump Controls
New Checkpoint Flags
Kaboom! Make a blast with Bombs
Unlockables!
Swapping Between Special Attacks
Internal Refactor - Make it easier to get newer versions out quicker.
And more! I've had more feedback requests added roadmap.

So what are you waiting for? go try it out now!
